title: 70 Park Ave Hotel- Beautiful Hotel Incredible Service
text: I always stay at 70 Park Ave Hotel when I travel to NY on business (or for any reason). The hotel is immaculate, the location is fantastic, the service is impeccable and the staff will take care of your every need. I always feel comfortable and- most importantly- at home when I come here. The hotel cares about every guest and every detail. A refreshing change from Hyatt, Marriott, Westin and other chains.
